title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti. In another pan, sauté onions and garlic, add beef and cook thoroughly. Mix with tomato sauce. Serve hot.

title: Chicken Curry
instructions: Cook chicken with onions and spices. Add tomato and yogurt. Simmer until chicken is cooked.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables in hot oil. Add garlic, ginger, and soy sauce. Cook for a few minutes and serve.

title: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour into a baking tin, and bake at 350°F (175°C) for 30 minutes.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Mix lettuce, croutons, and parmesan with Caesar dressing. Serve chilled.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter bread, place cheese between slices, and grill until golden brown.

title: Beef Stew
instructions: Cook beef in pot, add vegetables and broth. Simmer for 2 hours until tender.

title: Fish Tacos
instructions: Grill fish, serve in tortillas with cabbage and lime. Add sour cream if desired.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix ingredients, pour batter on griddle, flip when bubbles form. Serve with syrup.

title: Fried Rice
instructions: Stir-fry vegetables, add cooked rice and soy sauce. Push aside, scramble eggs, then mix all.
